Package simple.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteBuffer
    Byte buffer utilizing a circular array that can auto-grow.
    DoubleParsePosition
    Object to hold start and end positions.
    Start and end positions can be marked and restored.
    Has several convenience methods.
    FileUtil
    All close(...) methods now log a warning message.
    FilterFactory  
    IOLink
    Links an OutputStream with an InputStream or a Writer with a Reader.
    ParsePosition
    Holder for the current position while parsing.
    ReadWriterFactory
    Convenience methods for Readers.
    RenameFormat
    Depends on simple.io.ParseException, simple.util.do_str Rename Tokens: $N File name without extension $N(n) Characters starting from n of the file name without extension.
    SFileFilter
    Simple version of a mask to filter files.
    StaticPrinter
    Prints various iterable and non-iterable things to a stream.
    StreamFactory
    convenience methods for InputStream and OutputStream
    StringWriterExt
    Extends upon StringWriter to add writeln().
    TextAreaOutputStream
    An output stream that prints to a JTextArea.
    TextAreaWriter
    A Writer that prints to a JTextArea.
    WriterOutputStream
    An OutputStream that prints to a Writer.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParseException
    For use with ParsePosition
    Created: 2008
